div.p: Sophisticated layered breathing with abstract airway symbolism
Choose how subtle or prominent you'd like the airway element to be

div.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; gap: 12px;
display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; gap: 15px;
text-align: center; margin-top: 50px; padding: 30px; background: white; border-radius: 16px; box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.06);
display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr)); gap: 20px; text-align: left; margin-top: 20px;

br.small: Sophisticated layered flows showing educational depth

div.style: margin-top: 30px; padding: 20px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #526ff5 0%, #7FB8E5 100%); border-radius: 12px; color: white;
div.p: I can now create your complete logo package with all file formats, sizes, and brand guidelines!
